personal.name: Vaibhav Agarwal
personal.title: Software Development Engineer
personal.subtitle: Passionate about building scalable web applications with React, Python, and modern technologies. Currently working at Solfin, specializing in frontend development and LLM integrations.

about.description: I'm a Software Development Engineer II with over 3 years of experience in frontend development, specializing in React and modern web development techniques. Currently working at Solfin, where I develop scalable UI components and integrate LLM technologies.

education.institution: Shri Siddhi Vinayak Group Of Institutions

achievements: Developed scalable UI components in React and integrated APIs to streamline solar loan application workflows
Built and fine-tuned an internal LLM wrapper to extract data from documents and auto-generate loan applications
Automated document processing, reducing manual effort by 70% and accelerating application creation
Improved internal tool efficiency by optimizing LLM prompts and refining system integration flows
Designed and developed scalable backend and frontend features using React and Python, resulting in a 30% improvement in application performance metrics
Integrated APIs, enhancing system interoperability and improving user experience by reducing integration time by 40%
Provided critical support during deployment, achieving 99.9% uptime and reducing average bug resolution time by 50%
Managed and prioritized tasks, ensuring timely delivery of 5 new features and 30 bug fixes per sprint
Conducted 100+ hours of thorough manual testing, resulting in a 95% reduction in post-deployment issues
Executed 500+ SQL queries for data manipulation, improving data accuracy and reliability by 98%
Identified and implemented 5 process improvements, increasing team efficiency by 15%
Developed responsive UI components using React, improving user engagement metrics by 20% based on analytics data
Collaborated with backend teams to integrate APIs, reducing integration time by 30% and improving data exchange efficiency
Led a team of 4 developers, providing mentorship and achieving a 95% on-time project completion rate
Coordinated with 3 cross-functional teams to define and implement frontend requirements, ensuring alignment with project goals
Identified and fixed bugs reported by QA teams, resulting in a 70% decrease in pre-release issues per sprint
Deployed frontend applications to staging and production environments multiple times, ensuring minimum downtime and seamless releases
Assisted in backend development with Node.js, contributing to a 15% improvement in overall development process efficiency
